transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji kya haal hai?
Customer: Haan haan good morning Rakesh ji Anurag baat kar raha tha aapka.
Executive: Haan good morning sir Anurag ji kya haal chaal hai?
Customer: Badhiya badhiya aap bataiye sir.
Customer: Ye bahut bada issue hai matlab bina email id ke allow kaise karta hai system aapka?
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Bina email id ke customer ko registered karne ke liye phone number se allow to kar deta hai.
Customer: Kai baar phone number fake hote hain.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Ya wo aapko pehle bhi bataya hi maine.
Executive: Haan to uska discussion to ho gaya tha na hamara jo aapne data policy kara diya tha.
Customer: Haan ye fir aaj aaya.
Customer: To isme number mujhe bhej diya kariye na aap whatsapp bhi kar diya kariye to main usko check karwa liya karunga usse kuch dikkat nahi hai aap jab bhi bhejte hain main check kara deta hu.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Haan ab main mail pe baitha tha maine kaha mail hi kar do yaar isliye matlab practice kahi na kahi hame nuksan bhi deti hai ab buyer suppose karo South India ka ya Kerala ka ya fir wo kisi aur country ka bhi hai to maine dekha do teen aise bhi pa raha hai usme Ambala register kar diya aapne dikha diya ki Ambala se inquiry dal rahe hain.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Kisi combination dikha karke aapne waha se dal diya.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Aur wo hai kahi aur baitha hua foreigner hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Kaise kaise ho raha hai kyu ho raha hai to maine kaha ek baar batayenge.
Executive: To aap bhejiye na fir usi me bhej diye hote aap jab pin kar rahe the to buyer ka building bhej dete main ek baar check karwa deta aap mujhe alag se fir whatsapp me bhejenge na abhi tab to main dekh paunga kyuki aapne waha par mention nahi kiya ki is buyer ka particular number ye naam to main kaise dekh paunga.
Customer: Haan chaliye main bhej deta hu aapko.
Executive: Haan haan to main wahi to keh raha hu Rakesh ji kuch bhi raha kare to aap main to kehta hu ki aap har do char din me kabhi bhi aapko time laga kare to aap phone kar liya kariye hum usi hisab se discussion kar lenge.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Hai na usme aisa kuch dikkat thodi hai Rakesh ji main to hamesha available rehta hu aapke liye.
Customer: Dusra dusra dikkat dusra dikkat hai ki BBD ka to inquiry hamare paas aata hai.
Customer: Kiska? Micro pipet me bahut kuch bhi nahi aata matlab aata hai to wo plastic wale jo dropper aate hain na us type ka pipet jata hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Wo thoda sa dekhne wala hai usko thoda sa review karwa dijiye.
Executive: Haan haan wo to main kara dunga aap jo bhi hai na.
Customer: Plastic pipet jo dropper aate hain aapne dekha hoga bachpan me ink uthate the hum log to us type ka pipet bhi aata hai that is called ha usko kuch aur plastic pipet bhi bolte hain but wo dropper type hota hai picture lagate hain log to aapko dikhega.
Customer: Achcha.
Customer: To wo wo product hamara nahi hai hamara to jo bhi hai section based hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur plastic pipet ke naam se humne koi shayad hi koi ek aad keyword le rakha ho.
Executive: Kaun se naam se bataiye?
Customer: Mujhe bhi dekhna padega ki plastic pipet humne liya to nahi hai ha ha ha plastic pipet ke naam se hai sir plastic pipet ke naam se aapka product ek hai jaise ki vertex variable displacement pipet 0.5 ul to 10 ml usme aapne valid purchase kari hui hai us product ke andar added hai.
Customer: Product product product ke name se na.
Executive: Haan haan to usme jo category hai wo pipet wo plastic pipet ki hai to agar rakhna hai to nahi rakhna to hata dijiye.
Customer: Hata dijiye hata dijiye.
Executive: Haan haan kyuki sari cheeze to aapko pata hai sir itne time se aap sari cheeze category ke hisab se hi aati hai na.
Customer: Haan nahi wo sabhi category me ek jaisa hi aa raha hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Ya to sabhi category me wo plastic pipet me hi fall karta hai.
Customer: Haan hamara pipet.
Customer: Shayad iski wajah se aisa ho raha hai.
Executive: To main plastic pipet wala category hata karke micro pipet kar do us vertex micro ha micro pipet.
Customer: Micro pipet sare me karwa dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai to micro pipet issue hai ha ha ha main samajh gaya to micro pipet ke alava fir wahi hai aapka bottle top dispenser pipet hai multi channel pipet hai aur multi channel hai fir ek automatic pipet hai aur ek pipet stand hai.
Customer: Haan wo sab micro pipet me hi jayenge sare main ek baar main bhi check kar lunga aap bhi kar lijiye.
Executive: Haan haan main category wagera aap mujhe khud se na ek baar aap check kar liya kariye products wagera category wagera thoda sa aapko cheezon ka jyada knowledge rehti hai iske bare me to agar aap mere ko bata denge main correction turant turant kar dunga aisa ho jata hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Hai na theek aur aap wo mujhe buyer ki detail bhejiye aisa kuch dikkat nahi hai wo aap jaise buyer ka detail bhejoge wo check karke bata dunga ki ya fir verify karwa lunga buyer kya hai kya nahi.
Customer: Verify to hoga lekin wo ab pata chala ke Kerala ka hai ya Sri Lanka ka hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha baat ho gayi aapko.
Customer: Ambala me logo ke paas jaise 10 20 le jao to rate alag hote honge kyuki Ambala me sari cheeze milti hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Glassware bhi milta hai waha pe matlab wo India ka hub hai scientific lab equipment ka to karte kya hai buyer wo rehte kisi aur country me dikhayenge Ambala aur inquiry dal denge Chandigarh se ek aur aaya tha mere paas to usko maine reply bhi kiya lekin uske baad fir usne baat nahi ki hai foreigners hi hai khali rate lete hain.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Achcha to ab humne ab humne dalna shuru kar diya subject to order quantity koi bhi maal denge to jo rate humne likha hai wo subject to order quantity hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Chalo main aapko call karta hu thodi der me zara boss ke sath hu.
Executive: Haan to aap mujhe wo buyer ki detail bhej dijiye to usko main ek baar check karwa lunga aur agar kuch bhi dikkat aaya kare na to aap mujhe se directly whatsapp ya call kar liya kariye hai na kyuki wo mail wali cheeze thoda sa rehti hai to nahi nahi main soch hi raha tha karunga main karta hu aapko theek hai theek hai aap mujhe detail bhej do main karwa deta hu verify aur ye jo mail wala aapne bheja ye close main kar deta hu jaisa abhi hamara discussion ho gaya to aapko ek baar feedback aayega wo kar dijiyega aap yes theek hai theek hai aap mujhe bhej do main karwata hu aapko sir theek theek theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- System allows registration without email ID.

- Phone numbers are often fake.

- Inquiries from different locations registered as Ambala.

- BBD inquiries are not relevant.

- Plastic pipet category is incorrect.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to check buyer details.

- Executive will check and verify buyer details.

- Agreed to change category to micro pipet.

- Executive will close the mail request.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send buyer details.

- Customer will provide feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- registration, email id, location, pipet, category
